entry.title: funtion-callback-promise
entry.content:
ç›®å½•ç»“æ„

.
â”œâ”€â”€ files
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ a.json
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ b.json
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ c.json
â”œâ”€â”€ funtion.js
â”œâ”€â”€ callback.js
â””â”€â”€ promise.js

function

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

const filename = 'a.json'
const fileUrl = path.resolve(__dirname, 'files', filename)
fs.readFile(fileUrl, 'utf8', (err, data) => {
  if (err) {
    console.log(err);
    return
  }

  console.log(data.toString());
})

callback

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

function getFileContent (filename, callback) {
  const fileUrl = path.resolve(__dirname, 'files', filename)
  fs.readFile(fileUrl, 'utf8', (err, data) => {
    callback(
      err,
      JSON.parse(data.toString())
    )
  })
}

const filename = 'a.json'
getFileContent(filename, (err, data) => {
  console.log(data.message);
  getFileContent(data.next, (err, data) => {
    console.log(data.message);
    getFileContent(data.next, (err, data) => {
      console.log(data.message);
    })
  })
})

promise

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

function getFileContent (filename) {
  const promise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const fileUrl = path.resolve(__dirname, 'files', filename)
    fs.readFile(fileUrl, 'utf8', (err, data) => {
      if (err) {
        reject(err)
        return
      }
      resolve(
        JSON.parse(data.toString())
      )
    })
  })
  return promise
}

const filename = 'a.json'
getFileContent(filename).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
  return getFileContent (data.next)
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
  return getFileContent(data.next)
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
})

entry.title: node-blog-route
entry.content:
æ·»åŠ è·¯ç”±

// src/router/blog.js

const handleBlogRouter = (req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const path = req.path

  if (method === 'GET' && path === '/api/blog/list') {
    return {
      msg: 'GET Blog List'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'GET' && path === '/api/blog/detail') {
    return {
      msg: 'GET Blog Detail'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/blog/new') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST Blog New'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/blog/update') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST Blog update'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/blog/del') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST Blog delete'
    }
  }
}

module.exports = handleBlogRouter


// src/router/user.js

const handleUserRouter = (req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const path = req.path

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/user/login') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST User login'
    }
  }

}

module.exports = handleUserRouter

ä¿®æ”¹å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶

// app.js

const querystring = require('querystring');

const handleBlogRouter = require('./src/router/blog')
const handleUserRouter = require('./src/router/user')

const serverHandle = (req, res) => {
  res.setHeader('Content-Type','application/json')

  const url = req.url
  req.path = url.split('?')[0]
  req.query = querystring.parse(url.split('?')[1])

  const blogData = handleBlogRouter(req, res)
  if (blogData) {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(blogData)
    )
    return
  }

  const userData = handleUserRouter(req, res)
  if (userData) {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(userData)
    )
    return
  }

  // 404
  res.writeHead(404, { 'Content-Type': 'text/plain' })
  res.write('404 Not Found')
  res.end()
}

module.exports = serverHandle

entry.title: node-blog-init
entry.content:
ç›®å½•æœºæ„

$ mkdir blog1 && cd blog1
$ mkdir bin && touch ./bin/www.js
$ touch app.js
$ npm init -y

.
â”œâ”€â”€ app.js
â”œâ”€â”€ bin
â”‚Â Â  â””â”€â”€ www.js
â””â”€â”€ package.json

å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–

$ npm install cross-env --save-dev
$ npm install nodemon --save-dev

ä¿®æ”¹package.json

{
  "name": "blog1",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "bin/www.js",
  "bin": {
    "blog1": "www.js"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon ./bin/www.js",
    "prd": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production nodemon ./bin/www.js"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "devDependencies": {
    "cross-env": "^7.0.2",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.4"
  }
}

// app.js

const serverHandle = (req, res) => {
  res.setHeader('Content-Type','application/json')

  const resData = {
    name: 'xiaokang',
    env: process.env.NODE_ENV
  }

  res.end(
    JSON.stringify(resData)
  )
}

module.exports = serverHandle


// www.js

const http = require('http');

const PORT = 8000
const serverHandle = require('../app');

const server = http.createServer(serverHandle)
server.listen(PORT)

entry.title: node-http
entry.content:
const http = require('http');
const querystring = require('querystring');

const server = http.createServer((req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const url = req.url
  const path = url.split('?')[0]
  const query = querystring.parse(url.split('?')[1])

  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json')

  const resData = {
    method,
    url,
    path,
    query,
  }

  if (method === 'GET') {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(resData)
    )
  }

  if (method === 'POST') {
    let postData = ''
    req.on('data', (chunk) => {
      postData += chunk.toString()
    })
    req.on('end', () => {
      resData.postData = postData
      res.end(
        JSON.stringify(resData)
      )
    })
  }
})

server.listen(8000)
console.log('OK');

entry.title: swift çš„åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†!
entry.content:
1. from objc to swift

const int count = 10; 
double price = 23.55;

NSString *firstMessage = @"Objc is awesome. ";
NSString *secondMessage = @"What do you think?";
NSString *message = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@", firstMessage, secondMessage];

NSLog(@"%@", message);


let count = 10
var price = 23.55

let firstMessage = "Swift is awesome. "
let secondMessage = "What do you think?"
var message = firstMessage + secondMessage

print(message)

2. å¸¸é‡ å’Œ å˜é‡

3. ç±»å‹æ¨è®º

4. å­—ç¬¦ä¸² String

// å¤§å†™å’Œå°å†™è½¬æ¢

// ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢

5.æµç¨‹æ§åˆ¶

var time = 6

if time == 6 {
    print("è‡ªå·±ç…®æ—©é¤")
} else {
    print("åˆ°å¤–é¢ä¹°æ—©é¤")
}

// æˆ–è€…

case 6:
    print("è‡ªå·±ç…®æ—©é¤")
default:
    print("åˆ°å¤–é¢ä¹°æ—©é¤")
}


var money = 9999

if money >= 100000 {
    print("å‡ºå›½æ¸¸")
} else if money >= 10000 && money < 100000 {
    print("å›½å†…æ¸¸")
} else if money >= 1000 && money < 10000 {
    print("çœå†…æ¸¸")
} else {
    print("å¸‚å†…æ¸¸")
}

// æˆ–è€…

switch money {
case 100000...:
    print("å‡ºå›½æ¸¸")
case 10000...99999:
    print("å›½å†…æ¸¸")
case 1000...9999:
    print("çœå†…æ¸¸")
default:
    print("å¸‚å†…æ¸¸")
}

6. æ•°ç»„ Array

var book1 = "æ°´æµ’ä¼ "
var book2 = "ä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰"
var book3 = "è¥¿æ¸¸è®°"

// è·å–ç¬¬ä¸€æœ¬ä¹¦

// æ·»åŠ ä¸€æœ¬ä¹¦

// ä¸€å…±æœ‰å¤šå°‘æœ¬ä¹¦
bookArray.count


// éå†æ‰€æœ‰ä¹¦ç±

    print(bookArray[index])
}

for index in 0...bookArray.count-1{

}

for book in bookArray {

}

7. å­—å…¸ Dictionary

var animalDict = [
    "cat": "ğŸ±",
    "dog": "ğŸ¶",
    "pig": "ğŸ·",
    "cow": "ğŸ®"
]

// è¿™é‡Œæœ‰å‡ºç°ä¸€ä¸ªè­¦å‘Šâš ï¸ Expression implicitly coerced from 'String?' to 'Any'

for (key, value) in animalDict {
    print("Title: \(key)")
    print("Emoji: \(value)")
    print("---")
}

8. å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ Optionals

// å£°æ˜ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º nil çš„ å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

hobby = "running"

// âŒ Value of optional type 'String?' must be unwrapped to a value of type 'String'
// var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby

// æ‰€ä»¥å–å€¼çš„æ—¶ï¼Œåº”è¯¥è§£å¼€å¯é€‰ç±»å‹

    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby!
    print(message)

}

// 2. å¯é€‰ç»‘å®šï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å°†ä¸€ä¸ª æœ‰å€¼çš„å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ èµ‹ç»™ä¸€ä¸ª ä¸´æ—¶çš„å˜é‡

    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobbyValue
    print(message)
}
